amendment.description: To reauthorize LIHEAP, Weatherization assistance, and State Energy Programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 860 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 860 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 840. (consideration: CR S7448-7449; text: CR S7448) To reauthorize LIHEAP, Weatherization assistance, and State Energy Programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 860 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 860 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 840.
